Class customerAddController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.customerAddController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class customerAddController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The customerAddController is used as the Controller for customerAddForm.fxml.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Mary Williams

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        The initialize method is used to fill the Country combo box with all Countries and disables the Division combo box until a Country is picked.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - Resource pointer used by initialize.
        resourceBundle - Locale-specific objects used by initialize.

      • customerCountryPicked

        void customerCountryPicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The customerCountryPicked method filters the Division Combo box to a list of divisions in the selected Country.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent that triggers this method. When the user picks a Country from the Country Combo box this method is called.

      • customerAddSave

        void customerAddSave​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
              throws java.io.IOException
        The customerAddSave method checks that the user has input valid data into each Text Field and selected a Country and Division, creates a new Customer in the database, and returns to mainForm.fxml. Data validation checks performed include checking if any fields are left empty, and that each Text Field input is not too long for the database. Dialog boxes with relevant error messages are given to the user if any input is invalid or not completed.
        Parameters:
        event - The MouseEvent that triggers this method. When the user clicks on the 'Save' Button this method is called.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Failed to load maniForm.fxml.

      • customerAddCancel

        void customerAddCancel​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        The customerAddCancel method returns the user to mainForm.fxml. This method checks if the user has input anything into the Text fields or selected anything from a Combo box, sending them a confirmation that they would like to return without saving the Customer.
        Parameters:
        event - The MouseEvent that triggers this method. When the user clicks on the 'Cancel' Button this method is called.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Failed to load mainForm.fxml.
